product_name: The North Face Aries T-Shirt - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Made of soft, breathable merino wool, The North Face Aries long sleeve T-shirt provides essential warmth as you snowshoe over snowy meadows or run along chilly trails. Merino wool/polyester fabric provides a lightweight blend of warmth and natural moisture wicking. FlashDry(TM) microparticles embedded in the fabric dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive leads to faster dry times and will not wash out. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. The North Face Aries long sleeve T-shirt features reflective logos to boost your visibility when wearing it on its own. From the Flight Series(TM), developed by The North Face and tested by outdoor athletes; designed for done-in-a-day and weekend adventures. Closeout.
short_description: Made of soft, breathable merino wool, The North Face Aries long sleeve T-shirt provides essential warmth as you snowshoe over snowy meadows or run along chilly trails.
